title: Cifuentes wants 'fearless' football from Leicester
summary: New boss Marti Cifuentes says he wants Leicester City playing "fearless" football once more.

title: West Ham in talks with free agent striker Wilson
summary: West Ham are in talks with free agent Callum Wilson, who left Newcastle after his contract expired at the end of June.

title: 'A win-win' - reaction in Barcelona to Rashford's arrival
summary: Spanish football expert Andy West looks at how Marcus Rashford's loan move from Manchester United to Barcelona has been received in Spain.
